full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I BSDUS PA'I RGYUD KYI RGYAL PO'I SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA'I TSIG DON RNAM PAR BSHAD PA RIGS LDAN DGYES PA'I DRI MED MCHOD SPRIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @151A *, ,CES PA 'DI YANG DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS LHA LDAN DU SMRAS PA'O,, ,, ` SVASTI, ,RGYUD KYI MTHAR THUG DPAL LDAN DUS 'KHOR LO'I, ,RGYUD SDE RGYA MTSO'I YANG SNYING LEGS BSRUB DPYID, ,SKAL BZANG 'GRO LA CHOS SBYIN SPEL BA'I SLAD, ,MI ZAD PAR GYI SGO 'PHAR DENG 'DIR PHYE, ,DGE 'DIS BSTAN DAR DE 'DZIN ZHABS BRTAN CING, ,'GRO KUN BDE SKYID RGYA MTSO'I DPAL LA SPYOD, ,KHYAD PAR 'DI SGRUB MTHUN RKYEN GANG BGYIS KUN, ,RGYUD DON BDUD RTZI'I RO LA RTAG ROL SHOG ,MA 'ONGS RDZOGS LDAN BSTAN SGRON 'BAR BA'I TSE, ,RIGS LDAN RGYAL POS DGYES BZHIN RJES BZUNG STE, ,PHYI NANG GZHAN GSUM SBYOR BA'I THABS MKHAS KYIS, ,TSE GCIG NYID LA STONG GZUGS 'GRUB PAR SHOG ,('DI NI KHU RAL CHEN MO DGA' LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI PAR KHANG DU BZHUGS,, ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
